config.name: Instagram
config.description: Instagram Graph API for managing Instagram Business and Creator accounts

fields.text: Fields to retrieve (e.g., id, username, account_type, media_count, profile_picture_url)

meta.description: Get Instagram Business Account information

fields.text: Fields to retrieve (e.g., id, caption, media_type, media_url, permalink, thumbnail_url, timestamp, username)

limit.text: Number of media objects to retrieve (default: 25, max: 100)

meta.description: Get media objects for an Instagram Business Account

fields.text: Fields to retrieve (e.g., id, caption, media_type, media_url, permalink, thumbnail_url, timestamp, username, like_count, comments_count)

meta.description: Get details of a specific media object

image_url.text: URL of the image to publish (for IMAGE media type)

video_url.text: URL of the video to publish (for VIDEO media type)

location_id.text: Location ID to tag in the media

media_type.text: Type of media: IMAGE, VIDEO, or CAROUSEL_ALBUM

children.text: Comma-separated list of media IDs for carousel (for CAROUSEL_ALBUM)

thumb_offset.text: Thumbnail offset in seconds for video (for VIDEO)

is_carousel_item.text: Whether this is a carousel item

meta.description: Create a media container for publishing

creation_id.text: The creation_id returned from creating the media container

meta.description: Publish a media container to Instagram
Delete a media object

period.text: Time period: day, week, days_28, lifetime
